column3: GAME IS 21; FIRST TO SCORE 21 WINS

column20: If both 0, guy with higher max stamina wins (more hustle/grit/determination in face of adversity)
if both 1, guy with higher max speed wins (beat to spot)
if attacker 1, opponent 0, next function applies!
if opponent 1, attacker 0, TURNOVER -- OPPONENT'S TURN!

column16: Weighted probability of love hitting the shot (so, for 3's, .387 -- this variable changes depending on shot-type selected; no FT's in pick up ball so not eFg%)

column25: 1 - Durant's block% (consider using 82games BLOCK RATING here)

column20: this is "the next function" from above --
if both 0, guy with higher height wins (if both fail positioning wise, tall guy can make or break)
if both 1, guy with higher modified speed wins; modified speed is ATTACKER'S SPEED V. OPPONENT'S SPEED/2 (since attacker theoretically already got open/beat to spot)

column20: if attacker 1, opponent 0, SHOT SUCCESSFULLY FIRED AT PERCENTAGE ABOVE

column21: if offense recovers shot, new attack!
